scenes.action_text: A GOOD PERSON Written by Zach Braff FINAL MOVIE SCRIPT 1 1 INT. DANIEL'S HOUSE - BASEMENT - DAY THE CAMERA CRESTS an evergreen-covered mountain and DIVES down into a picture-perfect small town. It takes a moment for our eyes to realize it isn't a real place, but rather an incredibly intricate MODEL TRAIN TOWN. THE CAMERA FLOATS DOWN MAIN STREET: All of the people are happy, frozen
